nodes.text: The Ongmuel plant was a herbal plant with leaves that resembled dangling spiders native to the planet Dathomir. The Singing Mountain Clan used leaves of the Ongmuel plant for their healing properties while the Nightsisters used them to cause harm.
In 1 ABY, the witch Rubina asked a spacer to gather Ongmuel plant leaves to assist either the Singing Mountain Clan or the Nightsisters.
